label: Loot Tavern - Welcome to the Jungle

Grab.name: Grab
Grab.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 ([[/r 3d6 + 6]]) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 17).

Bash.name: Bash
Bash.description: The ape takes two creatures grappled by it and savagely smashes them against one another, forcing each one to make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 25 ([[/r 3d12 + 6]]) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Solar Beam.name: Solar Beam
Solar Beam.description: With a roar, a beam of brilliant light blasts from the ape's mouth in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line. Each creature in the line must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 ([[/r 3d8]]) fire damage and 13 ([[/r 3d8]]) radiant damage on a failure, or half as much damage on a success. If the ape starts its turn in direct sunlight, this action automatically recharges.

Photosynthesise.name: Photosynthesise
Photosynthesise.description: As a bonus action when in direct sunlight, the ape can absorb the sun's energy, regaining 10 ([[/r 2d6 + 3]]) hit points.
